main event: A sighting of a circular, flat, white and glowing object observed in Springfield, Massachusetts in February 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes moving straight and descending,The sighting occurred at 10:30 PM local time,The observer reported that it could not be a meteor due to the length of observation,If moving rapidly and erratically, it could be a jet or balloon,The analysis noted high altitude activity in the area.
sighted object: circular, flat, white and glowing object
witness description: The witness observed the object at high altitude.
